query:
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN startDate < '2026-01-18' THEN 'Past (before today)'
    WHEN startDate >= '2026-01-18' THEN 'Future (today or later)'
  END as date_category,
  COUNT(*) as booking_count,
  SUM(ownerAmount) as total_owner_amount
FROM bookings 
WHERE status = 'confirmed' AND startDate >= '2025-07-01'
GROUP BY date_category;
command:

    WHEN startDate < '2026-01-18' THEN 'Past (before today)'
    WHEN startDate >= '2026-01-18' THEN 'Future (today or later)'
  END as date_category,
  COUNT(*) as booking_count,
  SUM(ownerAmount) as total_owner_amount
FROM bookings 
WHERE status = 'confirmed' AND startDate >= '2025-07-01'
